abstract: Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo fired another shot at Bank of America on Tuesday, asking the bank to allow its lawyers to be questioned.
snippet: Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo fired another shot at Bank of America on Tuesday, asking the bank to allow its lawyers to be questioned.
lead_paragraph: Updated with Bank of America’s response | 4:40 p.m.  From Louise Story, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: Cuomo Takes Aim at Bank of America’s Lawyers
